mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_NO, DT, ORDER_DATE, PAY, PAY_YN, USER_NO, CLASS_NO, MINUS_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, MINUS_YN, MINUS_DATE, CLASS_OPTION_NO, CALL, NAME, MONEY, CLASS_NAME FROM CLASS_RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_NO =#{reserveNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(RESERVE_NO) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(RESERVE_NO)+1 END AS RESERVE_NO FROM CLASS_RESERVE
INSERT INTO CLASS_RESERVE VALUES (#{reserveNo}, TO_DATE(#{dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE, #{pay}, 1, #{userNo}, #{classNo}, #{totalPrice}, #{totalPrice}*0.9, 0, null, #{classOptionNo}, #{call}, #{name}, #{money}, #{className} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET MONEY=(SELECT MONEY FROM USERS WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo})-#{money} WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
